page.title: 16 INKPEN - OUR FAMILY TREES
page.content: We have been looking at the meaning of our own names and also tracing our family trees. We have arrived at Inkpen from all over the country in order that our dads can work nearby. Staves - probably something to do with making fences; born in Ripon, Yorks; parents come from Doncaster and Ickenham, Middlesex. Dixon - short for Richard; born in Newbury; parents came from Melksham, Wilts and Worthing in Sussex. Thomas - family name comes from first name; born in Nottingham; parents come from Petersfield and Newbury. Fielding - living in a field, born in Gloucester; parents come from Yeovil, Somerset and Hyde, Cheshire. Owens - Welsh Owen son; born in Basingstoke; parents come from Isle of Wight and Barnard Castle. Hine - servant; born in Cambridge.
